title: Action in Vietnam
creator_credit: Department of the Army, Frank Bagnal and John Abbott
brief_description: Scenes of the Australian Army First Battalion in South Vietnam. Shows part of a search and destroy mission in War Zone D. Also shows Vietnam under attack and the setting up of a medical post in a village. Narrated by Max Meldrum.
creator_credit_for_label: Department of the Army, Frank Bagnal and John Abbott
